summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2314 for the improvement of the Alley in Block Fifty-two (52), A. A. Denny's Addition to The City of Seattle (being the alley from Olive Street to Pine Street, between Third and Fourth Avenue); all in The City of Seattle, by paving the same with vitrified brick laid upon a proper concrete foundation, and by providing for the necessary surface drainage; under Ordinance No. 23917, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
